response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, but recognizing its importance to you, we aim to make it accessible. We propose a price of $12,000 for this product. This figure encapsulates not only its cost but also reflects the unique benefits and features it offers. We believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition for both parties. Should you be interested in proceeding with this offer, please let us know. If not, we have another potential buyer, John, who is willing to purchase the product for its full value of $15,000. We look forward to your response.", "product_price": 12000}
